voucherText1: The voucher can be orderd right now and used at a later date by any 1 person, staying available for 1 year from the date of purchase. It can make for a surprising and very memorable gift to a loved one!
voucherText3: We only ask that we be contacted a few days in advance if you want to come with one or more flying vouchers, so we can make sure the weather is ideal for paragliding.
